If you like a reskin of cs 1.6 that plays different than the game and is $5 more than csgo this is for you!
Its wery great, reminds me of old days :)

This game is a lot BETTER then CS:GO. For the first. The game itself has better graphics, guns, names, character selection, community servers and best of all, Killable Hostages. I have always wanted to kill those fat fucks who always needs to be rescued! and in this game you can. ALLMOST without penalty. 

Theres no competitive mode. Which is good as you dont get the silver 1's blaming 64 tick servers and hitboxes for their shity ass aim.  And you dont have globals thinking they are better then everyone else. 

In this game. There are no skins. So you dont have to spend money on fucking 8-Bit pixels fucking you over becuase that expensive 100$ knife you just bought on the market suddently dropped to 30$ and you just wasted your money.  

Tough, some servers have plugins adding skins. Which I am okay with as you dont have to fking buy them. (i hope) This game has so much more potential then CS:GO for the first. It doesnt get SHIT updates like CS:GO does. The main reason this game does infact not get SHIT updates, is because it doesnt get updates at all. But its still good. 

(still waiting for R8 in CS:S) 

Now lets come over to bhoping. In the beautiful community of CS:S some servers have bhoping banned. Which means if you bhop, you get banned. Which is absolute bullshit. I mean then again. People using the mousewheel to bhop thinking they are good are bad. Practise the spacebar bois. (Lenny face but too lazy) 

I remembered a couple of months back. Me, my friend, and another swedish guy I was talking to over fucking skype becuase we never bothered to get teamspeak. And back then Discord was non-exsistant. (tough I am still using skype today becuase I am a lazy cunt) Well lets get to the point. I was sitting on my shit ass fucking laptop. He was siting on his SHiit ass fucking laptop. And we we're gonna play CS:S also known as Counter Strike Source. And whenver he said "Source" I couldnt stop laughing. He pronounced it like this "Schourge" Yes. "Schourge" I mean then again... Counter strike : Schourge would make for a great title. Volvo plz fix. 

This game is overall good. And I recommend it on my highest. Just don't use the AK becuase it is shit. + I cant aim it. :)

The game also has Friendly fire. Which you can toggle on and off. Which is nice.

So im exploring this unknown cave trying to complete a quest.   i had to Lockpick the entrance and twists and turns going deeper until it opens. ok, im going deeper and deeper, its dripping wet. oh! and its getting warmer and warmer in here too.  ^^  I'll need to master my two handed skill for this quest.
1 of the best games around , no doubt. will have you coming back for more time after time

Best Counter Strike game? Whatever your opinion a true classic, must have  shooters. Not as classic as 1.6, and not as modern as Go, yet CS:S manages to find the perfect balance. Making it a joy to play even this long after release.
